summary: The Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) course is a prestigious training program in the field of information security and cybersecurity. The course covers a wide range of topics, including Security and Risk Management, Asset Security, Security Architecture and Engineering, Communication and Network Security, Identity and Access Management (IAM), Security Assessment and Testing, Security Operations, and Software Development Security. The program is hybrid, conducted both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University and simultaneously via Zoom. It spans 10 sessions, totaling 50 academic hours, and is held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. The course is designed for professionals with at least five years of experience in the field and requires a consultation with an academic advisor as a prerequisite. It is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel.

COURSE NAME: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).

COURSE OVERVIEW: The CISSP course is a prestigious training program in the field of information security and cybersecurity. It is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academic partner in Israel. This program is designed to provide participants with advanced knowledge and skills in cybersecurity, preparing them for the globally recognized CISSP certification.

TARGET AUDIENCE: This course is aimed at professionals with experience in the field of information security and cybersecurity who are seeking to enhance their expertise and achieve the CISSP certification.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The course is managed by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which specializes in dedicated programs for cybersecurity and high-tech training.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have five years of experience in the field and must undergo an interview with an academic advisor.

CERTIFICATIONS: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 13.11.2024.
- Schedule: Sundays and Wednesdays, from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Duration: 10 sessions, totaling 50 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes are conducted on-campus at Bar-Ilan University and simultaneously via Zoom.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified in the provided text.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Security and Risk Management.
- Asset Security.
- Security Architecture and Engineering.
- Communication and Network Security.
- Identity and Access Management (IAM).
- Security Assessment and Testing.
- Security Operations.
- Software Development Security.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an interview and register: Call 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academic partner in Israel. The school specializes in dedicated programs for high-tech and cybersecurity training.
